alert.note: Alert for Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Portland (Northwest Oregon and Southwest Washington)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 12 at 12:01PM PST until January 14 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Portland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to 6 inches and ice accumulations of around a quarter of an inch. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills and Cascade Foothills in Lane County. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and tree damage are likely due to the ice. Travel could be difficult. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow levels around 1500 feet this afternoon will lower tonight. Freezing rain is expected to increase after midnight, likely remaining south of Estacada.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1, or visit for Oregon: https://www.tripcheck.com and for Washington: https://wsdot.com/travel/real-time/map

area.areaDesc: Cascade Foothills in Lane County; Northern Oregon Cascade Foothills
